thread.title: Jamie Carragher slams both Liverpool AND Leicester’s players after the Foxes secure vital 3-1 victory – just days after sacking Claudio Ranieri
thread.title_full: Jamie Carragher slams both Liverpool AND Leicester’s players after the Foxes secure vital 3-1 victory – just days after sacking Claudio Ranieri

author: jhutchinson
title: Jamie Carragher slams both Liverpool AND Leicester’s players after the Foxes secure vital 3-1 victory – just days after sacking Claudio Ranieri
text:
EFL PULLING NO PUNCHES Jamie Carragher slams both Liverpool AND Leicester’s players after the Foxes secure vital 3-1 victory – just days after sacking Claudio Ranieri 
Jamie Vardy bagged a brace, and a rocket from Danny Drinkwater helped Leicester claim a vital three points at the King Power Stadium by JOHN HUTCHINSON
